titre-txt: Web and Mobile fullstack JavaScript developper currently Freelance using MERN standart (MongoDB, Express, React, Node) open to new professionnal opportunities
soustitre02: Few words to know more about me
p05: Professional website of a sports hall, with payment system and automated STRIPE withdrawals with personalized billing period, contact form, user account, made in NextJs.
p07: Small website udpate daily to keep track of match result for a mobile game PVP oriented
p06: Complete E-Commerce platform with administration system to view customer orders as well as sales figures and curves.
card-p: My first websites saw the light of day a few years ago. First for myself as a hobby, then for friends, and later for clients wanting to develop their business on the internet.
card-p02: Mainly self-taught then having validated my skills with a training at La Capsule.
card-p03: i like to resolve problems and create my own solution for the needs of my customers, i'm looking for a web developper or mobile developper work where i can grown and learn even more and where my limits are challenged.
p04: Membership management platform for associations. Allows you to view the list of its members and validate the payment of a membership fee. Personal project still in development.
